entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow with rain this morning and late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
